summary: A film about the noted American linguist/political dissident and his warning about corporate media's role in modern propaganda.
cast: Mark Achbar|Karin Aguilar-San Juan|Paul Andrews|William F. Buckley|Noam Chomsky|Robert Faurisson|Jeff Greenfield|Jeff Hansen|Loie Hayes|Edward S. Herman|Arnold Kohen|Robert MacNeil|Bill Moyers|Yossi Olmert|Lydia Sargent|Greg Shackleton|Linda Trichter Metcalf|Peter Jennings|Sarah McClendon|Tom Wolfe
title: Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the Media
